SettingsActivity2vity--> Environment settings Photo marker minimum cluster If there are more markers than a set point within a certain distance, use cluster markers to increase readability.
Timeline
Are you sure you want delete all saved photo maps? Are you sure you want delete all saved photo maps when contains \'%1$s\' keyword?
explorer overlay photos action_settings add Click on the keyword, you can view the photos taken nearby. view(KOREA) View(WORLD) Close Registered in Explorer Updating thumbnails Setting Down scale font send log Photo Home Photo Home(SD) register all gallery Stop Close
In batch mode or register location information (GPS), it does not register the photos to an existing registration.\npictures without location information (GPS) is simply individual properties using the search function of the address easy photo map. succeed registration photos duplicate photos no gps data photos failed registration photos Click on the \'Close\' button to exit.
The current version is only available with an existing registered Photos. There is no registered Photos.
GPS information is not present in the photo file. \nWould you like to use the address search? No time information The picture of the same name already exists. Photo has registered on Easy Photo Map. Register Photo Checking GPS information... Would you like to register? Generate thumbnail... There are no pictures folder currently registered. Update list.. Do you want to register all photos in the current folder? Select the \'OK\' button to go to the Photo Map screen.\nIf you want to move to the previous folder, select the \'Cancel\' button and click the folder name of the navigation. Do you want to register all the photos in the current folder and its subfolders?
Thumbnail of the updated information... Choose a picture. update thumbnail The original of the photo could not be found.
Choose a picture.
The picture of the same name already exists. Photo has registered on Easy Photo Map.
easy photo map setting enable date filter
It does not receive GPS information.
confirm cancel easy photo map preference setting
Before the picture is taken, please activate the tag location in the camera settings. If the tag location setting is not enabled, you must enter the location information manually by using the address search function. Confirm Do not show after this time The location tag setting screen may differ depending on the mobile phone.
Disable camera setup guide Camera does not show the entire GPS geotag information.
Activate copy generation Create copies of photographs during registration. If you create a copy even if the original picture is deleted, you can view pictures using the copy.
Explorer activated in reverse order The file and directory names in reverse order when sorted Explorer.
